scenario_text.value:
Sorry for the wait! Now Minoru’s on the case!
Nah, that’s no good. Maybe...

Hey there, aren’t you forgetting someone?!
No, no, that’s too weak. Hmm...
(Is that...Minoru? I wonder what he’s up to.)

There’s no need to fear, for now Minoru has
arrived! ...Almost! Maybe something shorter.

Take this! Minoru Strike! No, no, that’s all
wrong!
It...lacks a certain charm. Hmm...
Minoru?

Uwah! T-Takuma! How long have you been
there?!

Since, “Sorry for the wait! Now Minoru’s on
the case!”

Oh... You heard that, did you? Man, talk
about embarrassing!
So, Minoru...what’s this all about?

You really want me to tell you? Well, I was
just...you know...
Practicing my catch phrase.
Your catch phrase?!
What do you mean?
Like you’re a hero?
Let me try too!
What do you mean your catch phrase?
Oh, well...you know.

Ahahahaha! Oh, quit taking it so seriously!
I was just kidding!

What? You think I’d actually have time for
a catch phrase in the middle of a fight?!
You mean...like you’re a hero or something?

And what’s wrong with that?! Man, why did you
have to overhear?!

Anyway, look. I’m thinking maybe in this
world, I actually could be a hero.

I could save you if you’re ever in trouble,
or if you get scared.

Or I could show up right when you’re about to
pee your pants. Wouldn’t that be cool?

(Why is it always me who’s in trouble in
these scenarios?)
Ooh, then let me try too!

Hey! Don’t you go copying me! You’ll owe me
royalties if you do!

Royalties? But it’s not like having money
will do you any good here.

And anyway, you’ve got it all wrong. Wouldn’t
it be cooler if we had lines to say together?
Oh, I get it. Yeah, you’re right! Great idea!

You are the best, Takuma! This is why we’re
best friends! Partners! Real bros!

But don’t tell any of the others about this
yet, okay?

We still need to work things out a little
more, make things seem effortless.

I know! We can start doing special training,
starting tomorrow! We meet here at 5:00 AM!
(Is Minoru that serious about this?!)
